_A_TEXTAREA_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The ATextarea component provides the functionality of a text field with various settings such as scalability, a clear button, and the ability to resize. The component also supports labels, help text, and error display.
_A_TEXTAREA_GROUP_IS_SCALABLE_DESCRIPTIO: This example demonstrates a text field whose height automatically adjusts to the content. As new lines are added, the text field expands, providing an optimal size to display all entered text.
_A_TEXTAREA_GROUP_RESIZE_DESCRIPTION_: This example shows various options for configuring the resizing capabilities of the text field. You can set vertical resizing (resize='v'), horizontal resizing (resize='h'), completely disable resizing (resize='none'), or allow automatic resizing (resize='auto'). Each option is demonstrated using the corresponding text field.
_A_TEXTAREA_PROPS_IS_SCALABLE_DESCRIPTIO: Determines whether the height of the text field should change based on the content. If this parameter is set to true, the height of the text field will automatically adjust as characters are added or removed.
_A_TEXTAREA_PROPS_RESIZE_DESCRIPTION_: Defines how the user can resize the text field. Available options: 'v' — vertical resizing, 'h' — horizontal resizing, 'none' — resizing is disabled, 'auto' — resizing is automatic.
_A_TEXTAREA_PROPS_ROWS_DESCRIPTION_: Sets the number of rows for the text field.
